p: Territory of Washington County of Walla Walla 1st District Court 1st Judicial District Wash Ter
The United States of America To Sheriff of Walla Walla County Washington Territory Greeting

You are hereby commanded to have the body of Myra Bell Montgomery by your Montgomery detained as it is said before Samuel G Winegard Judge of the District Court of the 1st Judicial District of Washington Territory Walla Walla County Washington Territory on Thursday the day of May 1876 at the hour of ten oclock AM of that day to do and what shall then and there be the said Myra Bell
Montgomery this writ.
Witness to Judge Samuel G Winegard
Judge of the said District Court the this the 30th day of May AD 1877
